columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique key or identification number for a given transaction.

columns.name: DATE_ITEM_1_DT
columns.description: The value of charge generic date item 1 in permanent transactions (ETR) record. The information is entered by users when the charge is posted in Charge Entry and filed to this record when the charge is filed.

columns.name: DATE_ITEM_2_DT
columns.description: The value of charge generic date item 2 in permanent transactions (ETR) record. The information is entered by users when the charge is posted in Charge Entry and filed to this record when the charge is filed.

columns.name: CATEGORY_ITEM_1_C_NAME
columns.description:
The value of charge generic category item 1 in permanent transactions (ETR) record. The information is entered by users when the charge is posted in Charge Entry and filed to this record when the charge is filed. The category values are all custom values that can be viewed or entered by Administrators.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CATEGORY_ITEM_2_C_NAME
columns.description:
The value of charge generic category item 2 in permanent transactions (ETR) record. The information is entered by users when the charge is posted in Charge Entry and filed to this record when the charge is filed. The category values are all custom values that can be viewed or entered by Administrators.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CATEGORY_ITEM_3_C_NAME
columns.description:

The information is entered by users when the charge is posted in Charge Entry and filed to this record when the charge is filed. The category values are all custom values that can be viewed or entered by Administrators.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: NETWORKED_ITEM_1
columns.description: The value of charge generic networked item 1 in permanent transactions (ETR) record. The information is entered by users when the charge is posted in Charge Entry and filed to this record when the charge is filed. This item is networked to records in a masterfile defined by an administrator in the professional billing profile.

columns.name: NETWORKED_ITEM_2
columns.description: The value of charge generic networked item 2 in permanent transactions (ETR) record. The information is entered by users when the charge is posted in Charge Entry and filed to this record when the charge is filed. This item is networked to records in a masterfile defined by an administrator in the professional billing profile.
